author: Flame442
install_msg:
Thanks for installing wordstats. Use `[p]wordstats`.
**WARNING**: This cog has the potential to create a lot of data and have a high I/O usage if your bot is in a large number of servers. Please remove this cog if you do not consent to that.
name: WordStats
description: Tracks the most commonly used words by every member and in every server. The number of times a word has been said by a particular member, server, or globally can be retrived from [p]wordstats. The users with the most words said in a particular server or globally can be retrieved from [p]topchatters. The users who have said a word more frequently compared to other users in a particular server or globally can be retrieved from [p]topratio.
end_user_data_statement: This cog persistently stores the number of times every unique word is said per-user per-guild. Data is collected on every message the bot can see unless the guild, channel, or user have opted out. Users can request that their data is deleted using `[p]wordstatsset forgetme` and can request to opt out of data collection using `[p]wordstatsset user no`.
